title: Culture Map Tromsø
description: The Culture Map is a collection of resources for culture creators in Tromsø. Use this to connect with other culture creators, and to find information, inspiration and maybe even your next venue!

sections.title: Do you know of something that should be on the map?
sections.text:
This map is kept up to date by Tvibit. Do you represent a community or organisation that wants to be a part of the map?

The map was last updated 07-Sept-2023

sections.title: Hvorfor de kategorier?
sections.text: De ressourcer, vi ønskede at sætte på kortet, er super varierede. De her 8 kategorier er det vi kom frem til. Her kan du læse lidt mer om hver af dem.
